$Slippi Recording [Fizzi, Achilles]
*Use in conjunction with Slippi in PortB to extract game data
C206B0DC 0000003F # send game frame

$Slippi Playback [Fizzi, UnclePunch]
*This code is for playing back replays from slp files. It plays whatever slp
*file is named CurrentGame.slp
041A45C0 3860000E # boot into game [UnclePunch]
C206B0DC 0000002B # receive game frame
7C0802A6 90010004
9421FFE0 9061001C
90810018 88FF000C
3D008045 61083080
1C670E90 7D081A14
80680004 2C03000E
40A20010 806800B4
7C03F000 41820080
48000095 38600076
4800009D 3C808048
80849D58 3C608047

3880FF85 7C632050
48000081 7CE33B78
4800006D 4800007D
